announcement.title: Announcements

reservation.title: Reservation
reservation.cancelReservationDescription: You are about to cancel your {{entity}}. Please note that this action cannot be undone. Once the {{entity}} is canceled, it cannot be restored.
reservation.cancelReservationPenalty:
This {{entity}} is under penalty window.
You have {{memberXCancellations}} penalty cancellations.
reservation.cancelReservationAbilityToReserve: You will not be allowed to reserve courts if you will have more than{{xPenaltyCancellationsToRemoveAbilityToReserve}} penalty cancellations
